page.title: 12RECREATION LEISURE.
page.content: To discover how people spent their leisure time in 1985 we devised a questionnaire. This was sent to a sample number of homes in Eyam.Below we show the questions asked and the replies. {DO YOU BELONG TO A CLUB OR {ORGANISATION? 75% belonged to a club. 46% belonged to the Village Club. 5% to other organisations in the village. 28% belonged to clubs outside the village. {DO YOU TAKE PART IN A SPORT,IF SO {WHERE? 44% took part in some sport. 23% within the village. 21% in an area outside the village.
